column2: "You seem pretty reliable. Is it because you're a member of ARKS?"
"You look like you can handle yourself pretty well! Though, if I let out my hidden power, you'd fall to my feet!"
"You look like you can handle yourself pretty well! Though, if I let out my hidden power, you'd fall to my feet!"
"Admitting when something is amazing is the duty of all powerful people!"
"Admitting when something is amazing is the duty of all powerful people!"
"Admitting when something is amazing is the duty of all powerful people!"
"Well, well. You've certainly been doing well lately, haven't you? You can speak to me in a relaxed manner."
"Well, well. You've certainly been doing well lately, haven't you? You can speak to me in a relaxed manner."
"Well, well. You've certainly been doing well lately, haven't you? You can speak to me in a relaxed manner."
"Well, well. You've certainly been doing well lately, haven't you? You can speak to me in a relaxed manner."
"Well, well. You've certainly been doing well lately, haven't you? You can speak to me in a relaxed manner."
"I wouldn't mind if you told people that you wound up the way you are because I was there for you. Okay?"
"I wouldn't mind if you told people that you wound up the way you are because I was there for you. Okay?"
"I wouldn't mind if you told people that you wound up the way you are because I was there for you. Okay?"

"どんどん活躍していってるよな。
もちろん、オレのおかげだよな？"

"ん？\u3000どうしたんだよ？
ふーん。パーティー参加希望、なあ……"

"おたくも知ってると思うけど
オレほどのアークスになると
結構忙しいんだぜ？"

"それに、そういうのはもっと
面倒見のいいヤツがいいと思うぜ！
おたくとかな！"

"相変わらず活躍しているな！
やっぱりオレが見込んだだけはあるぜ！"

"大変だったみてーだな！
あんまり、無茶すんなよ！"

"さすがおたくだな！
オレが見込んだだけのことはあるぜ！"

"よっ、復帰したみてーだな！
ま、おたくのことだから、オレは絶対
大丈夫だって思ってたぜ！"

"よっ、またまた忙しそうだな！
オレからの依頼も、暇なときに
見てくれよ！"

"よっ、またまた忙しそうだな！
オレからの依頼も、暇なときに
見てくれよ！"
